name: Anushka Shukla

current_company.name: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
current_company.title: QR Analyst @ JPMC | IIT Kgp | AmEx | HBS

experience.title: Summer Business Analyst
experience.description: Project 1: To improve the confidence score of income estimation by designing a cumulative model out of the 4 existing models • Designed various machine learning models including Decision Tree and Linear Regression to combine the income estimation models • Improved the confidence score by 10% as compared to the original model by engineering a self-designed decision tree modelProject 2: To achieve a higher confidence score in income prediction by relabeling the self-employed and salaried users • Generated new features from an existing dataset of banking features by formulating SQL queries on Google BigQuery API• Refined the area under the ROC curve by 50% (0.67 to 0.97) by designing a Weight of Evidence Logistic Regression model
experience.description_html: Project 1: To improve the confidence score of income estimation by designing a cumulative model out of the 4 existing models • Designed various machine learning models including Decision Tree and Linear Regression to combine the income estimation models • Improved the confidence score by 10% as compared to the original model by engineering a self-designed decision tree modelProject 2: To achieve a higher confidence score in income prediction by relabeling the self-employed and salaried users • Generated new features from an existing dataset of banking features by formulating SQL queries on Google BigQuery API• Refined the area under the ROC curve by 50% (0.67 to 0.97) by designing a Weight of Evidence Logistic Regression model

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: Worked on sentiment analysis of news articles of unlisted/listed companies to find their credibility.Used NLTK, machine Learning models for classification. I am also working on Google Cloud Natural Language Processing API to make a domain-specific custom model using Auto ML API.
experience.description_html: Worked on sentiment analysis of news articles of unlisted/listed companies to find their credibility.Used NLTK, machine Learning models for classification. I am also working on Google Cloud Natural Language Processing API to make a domain-specific custom model using Auto ML API. <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Worked on the research paper on Business Value Generators identification using an artificial neural network. Prepared the Literature Review and applied Deep learning models on the financial statements of various industries of the Czech Republic to predict the EVA value.

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: We are a team which manages International Affairs and Relation of IIT Kharagpur. We work under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations.•Taken Several Initiatives to boost IIT Kharagpur's International Ranking and to make its presence strong on the Global Platform. Improving and reviving many MOUs that IIT Kharagpur has with reputed universities dotted all over the globe.

experience.title: GES Intern
experience.description: During my tenure, I did publicity of Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2016 in different colleges of Jabalpur. During Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2017.Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur, is the largest entrepreneurship promoting student body in India and one of the largest in the world.Its aim is to foster the spirit of entrepreneurship among people and to educate,support and incubate people ready to start their own venture. It invites various eminent entrepreneurs to deliver lectures to educate students about the joys and hardships of entrepreneurship. Guest Lectures, Workshops, Case Study, Workshops, Knowledge Camps, Patent Workshops are conducted throughout the year to involve students in activities that are essential to an entrepreneur. E-Cell also actively incubates startup ideas by linking the right investors with the right entrepreneurs.
experience.description_html: During my tenure, I did publicity of Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2016 in different colleges of Jabalpur. During Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2017.Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur, is the largest entrepreneurship promoting student body in India and one of the largest in the world.Its aim is to foster the spirit of entrepreneurship among people and to educate,support and incubate people ready to start their own venture. It invites various eminent entrepreneurs to deliver lectures to educate students about the joys and hardships of entrepreneurship. Guest Lectures, Workshops, Case Study, Workshops, Knowledge Camps, Patent Workshops are conducted throughout the year to involve students in activities that are essential to an entrepreneur. E-Cell also actively incubates startup ideas by linking the right investors with the right entrepreneurs.
